attributes.action: ban the use of new materials in the manufacturing of disposeable carrier bags, replacing them with a minimum 50% recycled or 100% biodegradeable product, along with clear labelling of it's manufacturing content.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our waste sites are awash with carrier bags that end up in our waterways and blowing around on our streets. Sign this petition to encourage responsible manufacturing in the supply process of an everyday throw-away item.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the use of new materials in the manufacturing of disposeable carrier bags, replacing them with a minimum 50% recycled or 100% biodegradeable product, along with clear labelling of it's manufacturing content."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11070.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/betterbags/
